segments.text: Hello , there . You are looking a little confused ; can I help you with something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I've always used the Bank Book , but now I have this card . I don't know how to use it in the machine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry ; I can help you with that . I understand that new technology can sometimes be unnerving . The first thing we need to do is check the ATM is in service . This one is fine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I sure can . I feel like a dinosaur with all of these youngsters and their electronics . This machine is working , then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , this one is in service . Put your card in here , in this slot and wait a moment . Then you will see some instructions on the screen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it wants me to put in my PIN number . OK , I can do that ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And press ' enter ' to confirm , here . Now you need to decide which service you need .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are so many to choose from . I didn't know you could do all of this using a card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's the beauty of these machines , you can do almost anything . And unlike a person , they don't usually take breaks or go off sick !
segments.speaker: S1
